data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Larix occidentalis (Western larch) from sample SHER-52

Exposition N, Slope 15 deg, Geology: Granit-Grobblockschutt, Tree line 2100 m, av. Tree height 20 m, Tree cover 25%, Shrub cover 40%, Moss cover 60%, Vegatation type: Mehrstufiger Bestand. Mehr/wenig. Homogen, Film number: 734A
